title: Wild Card
description:
"Now? Now, it felt like there were claws scratching at me from the inside."
Amber Farrell, Denver PI, is hunting for the rogue Were in the secret heart of her home town.She’s unsure whether she can keep ahead of her own lethal problems long enough to catch the rogue, and she isn’t being helped by any of the paranormal community.And every new discovery seems to change the whole game…
author: Mark Henwick
